name: Manifest Love | Teal | Mens
description: In Color! Luke 10:27 "And he answering said, Thou shalt love the Lord thy God with all thy heart, and with all thy soul, and with all thy strength, and with all thy mind; and thy neighbour as thyself." Love God, love your neighbor. Jesus Christ put our job description in this simple statement and that's why our first shirt reiterates this important commandment. Don't forget that what you give equals what your receive... You + Manifesting Love = You Receive Love Live in love, even when you're not wearing the shirt. You'll be glad you did. Sizing Chart

name: Let Your Light Shine
description:
"Let your light so shine before men,
that they may see your good works, and
glorify your Father which is in heaven."
-Matthew 5:16


As we serve God, we bring light to the world. Through the example of your life and actions, countless eyes will see the amazing life and love God gives to His kids as they choose to serve Him and love Him. Because of the light that you shine into the lives of others, lifelong needs will be met and lives saved. Many will see your light shining, your good works, and glorify God. And that's what it's all about.

"Ye are the light of the world.
A city that is set on an hill cannot be hid."
-Matthew 5:14

name: Manifest Love | Teal | Womens
description: In Color! Luke 10:27 "And he answering said, Thou shalt love the Lord thy God with all thy heart, and with all thy soul, and with all thy strength, and with all thy mind; and thy neighbour as thyself." Love God, love your neighbor. Jesus Christ put our job description in this simple statement and that's why our first shirt reiterates this important commandment. Don't forget that what you give equals what your receive... You + Manifesting Love = You Receive Love Live in love, even when you're not wearing the shirt. You'll be glad you did. Sizing Chart

name: Speaking the Truth in Love
description:
Remember this popular question when you were wittle, “What do you wanna be when you grow up?”

Well, if your answer was, “To be more like Jesus Christ!” then boy-o-boy were you a cool kid and do we have a great shirt and tote bag for you!

You may ask how a t-shirt and tote bag could help you be more like Jesus Christ and help you attain your childhood dream. Well the message on this shirt and tote bag holds a major key to growing up to become more like Jesus Christ.


Ephesians 4:15

"But speaking the truth in love, may grow up into him in all things, which is the head, even Christ"


If we want to grow up to be more like our savior we need to speak the truth, God’s Word, while doing it in Love. We have to marinate the truth that we speak in Love, Love, Love because without love even the truth sounds unappealing (I Cor. 13:1).

name: Haiti John10:10
description:
“Who did this and how do we get out of it?”

That’s a common question we all ask when disaster strikes. The answer is found in John 10:10. "The thief cometh not but for to steal and to kill and to destroy, I (Jesus Christ) am come that they (that’s us!) might have life and that they might have it more abundantly." This verse is the guide to a life filled with abundance, which is what Haitians and so many others are in need of today. This shirt was put together by Doulos’ and supervised for translation accuracy by a wonderful Haitian native, with a great heart for God. It reads John 10:10 in Creole, the common language in Haiti, to give answers for the cause of all destruction, and direction to the more than abundant life. This past week, we shipped over a large load of these shirts to Haiti and they will be handed out specifically to God-respecting men, women and young people who will proclaim the truth that the thief, the devil, is the source of all destruction, death, and theft, but God had Jesus Christ come so we could have LIFE (LAVI) and have it more abundantly. Think that’s cool? When you buy one of these shirts it gives us the opportunity to send more! Serve your True Master and speak this truth wherever you are and guide others to the more abundant life.

name: Live To Give | Mens UNISEX
description:
The motto of a Doulos contained in three words. 

“Live to Give”

Simply BRILLIANT! 

This v-neck is smokin’. Not literally, but literally. 

You’re going to look like a hotsy-totsy in it, and you will be able to spread a great message to all who read your shirt, including yourself!

What is a Doulos? A person who lives to give to God and others, without reservation. 

That’s a straight shootin’ message. 

Enjoy this fresh v-neck and LIVE your life to GIVE!

name: Doulos Dove
description: The dove is a universal sign of peace, and there is no true peace without God. This shirt is a reminder of the peace God gave you. People's lives will change when the peace of God floods their lives. 2 Corinthians 13:11 "Finally, brethren, farewell. Be perfect, be of good comfort, be of one mind, live in peace; and the God of love and peace shall be with you." Sizing Chart

name: Dove Hoodie
description: The dove is a universal sign of peace, and there is no true peace without God. This shirt is a good-lookin' reminder of the peace God gave you. Sharing is caring! There's people whose lives will change when the peace of God floods their lives. 2 Corinthians 13:11 "Finally, brethren, farewell. Be perfect, be of good comfort, be of one mind, live in peace; and the God of love and peace shall be with you." Sizing Chart

name: For the Glory Of God
description: Our most asked question we receive is... "What motivated you to start this clothing line?" We thought it'd be a lot easier to make a sweet t that explains the heart of this company. "For The Glory of God" This is why we live. It's the reason for our existance. To love and glorify God as His kids. Warning! This shirt is for the bold. Wear it proudly. The next time someone asks you about this t-shirt you can tell them some things God does for you that makes you live for the Glory of God. Sizing Chart

name: Virtuous Woman
description:
Proverbs 31:30 "Favor is deceitful, and beauty is vain: but a woman that feareth the Lord, she shall be praised. A virtuous woman respects God. This is what makes her genuinely beautiful and is what brings praise to her name. This beautiful tee is a good-lookin' reminder that all the grace, charm, elegance, and beauty in this world doesn't hold a match to how bright your true beauty shines when you respect God and put Him first. You shall be praised, and you will shine with true beauty. It's a promise! Just give it a try and let this beautiful shirt help ya keep this mindset. Sizing Chart
*Concept Art by Kristen Rock

name: Isaiah 40:8
description: What will sustain us for all of our days? Will it be fame, money, our career or striking good looks that will hold up and withstand the test of a lifetime, or better yet, and eternity? God tells us that these things the world offers will wither and fade as the grass and flowers of the field. Matthew 6:19,20 we are told to focus on our treasure forever, heaven. This is the treasure that will stand a lifetime and further! Nobody can take that hope away from us. The best investment we can make with our lives is to put God first. When we do this God says he will bless our socks off (Matt. 6:33). The grass fadeth, the flower withereth, but the Word of God stands forever. If we want to make a mark throughout ALL history then all we gotta do is live the blueprint of the Bible and take God's advice. People, riches, careers, and even striking good looks come and go, but we have the opportunity to devote our lives to God and make eternal history. That's pretty sweet. Sizing Chart

name: Sweet to the Soul
description:
Proverbs 16:24

Pleasant words are as an honeycomb, sweet to the soul, and health to the bones.

What a simple, powerful statement. There are so many opportunities to speak pleasant words to others throughout our day.This pretty little scoop-neck tee can be a useful reminder to do just that. When we speak pleasant, kind, favor-filled words to people it is sweet and healing to their soul and bones. The innermost part of their being (figuratively and literally). Favor filled words can strengthen and nourish everyone from the inside out.

Sizing Chart
*Concept Art by Sarah Spencer

name: Mercy and Truth Tie
description:
Proverbs 3:3 
Let not mercy and truth forsake thee: bind them about thy neck; write them upon the table of thine heart. 
So shalt thou find favor and good understanding in the sight of God and man.

We are to bind these qualities, Mercy and Truth, about our neck and write them on the table of our heart. 

"Mercy" is translated in the Strong’s concordance as kindness, good deeds, and merciful (The way God shows mercy to us even though we were dead in trespasses and sins- Ephesians 2 and Colossians 2:13). 

The word "Truth" is translated as stability, trustworthiness, and certainty. 

Forsake means to let loose, relinquish, or relieve.

So when we hold tight to Mercy (kindness and good deeds) and Truth (stability and trustworthiness) we will find favor and good understanding in the sight of God and man!

Every time you wear this tie you can be reminded of the mercy and kindness you can emit to others and the truths in God Word that are your stability. 

Now you not only have a sweet tie. You will find favor with God and man by binding Mercy and Truth about your neck. 

Best tie ever.

name: Doulos Dog Tag
description:
In the military a person uses their dog tag as a form of identification. It’s who they are bound around their neck. 

The Doulos dog tag is a trendy reminder of who you are, it’s your identity as someone who has been branded as a server. 

Be who you are called to be and let the Doulos Dog-Tag remind you of your service to God and man that enriches your life and everyone you touch.

name: Doulos Band
description:
Rock this all day long! Genuine, durable, leather wristband stamped with the Doulos logo. You'll be lookin' fly and reminding yourself to be "on the give". This little wristband will do a lot for your life. p.s.- You should just get your friend one because they're gonna like it and want one too. So if you have a Lincon or two hangin' around just throw one of these puppies in the cart and bless your friend.
Doulos Band Sizing


*Thin= 3/4"

*Thick= 1.1/4"
